item.endshards.ender_armor.tooltip: SET BONUS: Negates all fall damage
item.endshards.ender_sword.tooltip: RIGHT CLICK: Warps enemies to the void
item.endshards.ender_tool.tooltip: Warps mined blocks to your inventory
item.endshards.netherite_armor.tooltip: SET BONUS: Provides resistance on damage
item.endshards.netherite_sword.tooltip: RIGHT CLICK: Set nearby enemies on fire
